results.source_text: Employee shall perform all duties and responsibilities customarily associated with Employee's position, as well as such other duties as may be assigned by the Company from time to time.

results.source_text: Employee agrees to devote Employee's full working time, attention, and best efforts to the performance of Employee's duties.

results.source_text: Employee shall comply with all Company policies, procedures, rules, and regulations as may be established and modified from time to time in the Company's sole discretion.

results.source_text: The Company reserves the right to require Employee to relocate to any other Company location, domestic or international, as business needs dictate, with or without additional compensation.
results.matched_text: The Company reserves the right to require Employee to relocate to any other Company location, domestic or international, as business needs dictate, with or without additional compensation.

results.source_text: Employee shall receive an annual base salary of One Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($175,000.00), payable in accordance with the Company's regular payroll practices, less all applicable withholdings and deductions.
results.matched_text: Employee shall receive an annual base salary of One Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($175,000.00), payable in accordance with the Company's regular payroll practices, less all applicable withholdings and deductions.

results.source_text: Bonus eligibility requires Employee to be actively employed on the date of payment. No partial or prorated bonuses will be paid if employment terminates for any reason prior to the payment date.
results.matched_text: Bonus eligibility requires Employee to be actively employed on the date of payment. No partial or prorated bonuses will be paid if employment terminates for any reason prior to the payment date.

results.source_text: PTO requests must be submitted at least two (2) weeks in advance and are subject to approval by Employee's supervisor. The Company may deny PTO requests based on business needs.

results.source_text: The Company shall reimburse Employee for reasonable and necessary business expenses incurred in the performance of Employee's duties, subject to the Company's expense reimbursement policies.
results.matched_text: The Company shall reimburse Employee for reasonable and necessary business expenses incurred in the performance of Employee's duties, subject to the Company's expense reimbursement policies.

results.source_text: Employee must submit expense reports with supporting documentation within thirty (30) days of incurring the expense. Failure to submit timely expense reports may result in forfeiture of reimbursement.
results.matched_text: Employee must submit expense reports with supporting documentation within thirty (30) days of incurring the expense. Failure to submit timely expense reports may result in forfeiture of reimbursement.

results.source_text: Employee agrees to hold all Confidential Information in strict confidence and not to disclose any Confidential Information to any third party without the Company's prior written consent. This obligation shall continue indefinitely and shall survive termination of employment.
results.matched_text: Employee agrees to hold all Confidential Information in strict confidence and not to disclose any Confidential Information to any third party without the Company's prior written consent. This obligation shall continue indefinitely and shall survive termination of employment.

results.source_text: Employee agrees not to use any Confidential Information for any purpose other than the performance of Employee's duties for the Company, both during and after employment.
results.matched_text: Employee agrees not to use any Confidential Information for any purpose other than the performance of Employee's duties for the Company, both during and after employment.

results.source_text: Upon termination of employment or upon the Company's request, Employee shall immediately return to the Company all documents, materials, equipment, and other property containing or relating to Confidential Information.

9. NON-COMPETITION

9.1 During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly, anywhere in the world:

(a)

results.source_text: During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly, anywhere in the world: ... (c) Develop, design, produce, market, sell, or distribute any products or services that compete with the Company's products or services.

During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly: (a) Solicit, recruit, hire, or attempt to solicit, recruit, or hire any employee, contractor, or consultant of the Company to leave the Company's employ or to provide services to any other person or entity

During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly: ... (b) Encourage or induce any employee, contractor, or consultant of the Company to breach any agreement with the Company

During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly: ... (c) Solicit, contact, or do business with any customer, client, vendor, or business partner of the Company for the purpose of providing products or services competitive with the Company's products or services

During the term of Employee's employment and for a period of twenty-four (24) months following the termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall not, directly or indirectly: ... (d) Interfere with or attempt to interfere with any business relationship between the Company and any customer, client, vendor, supplier, or business partner.

Employee agrees not to make any disparaging, defamatory, or derogatory statements about the Company, its products, services, officers, directors, employees, shareholders, or business practices to any third party, including but not limited to: customers, vendors, competitors, media, government agencies, or on social media platforms.

results.source_text: Employee may terminate employment by providing at least four (4) weeks' prior written notice to the Company. The Company may, in its sole discretion, waive such notice period or place Employee on paid leave during the notice period.

results.source_text: If Employee's employment is terminated by the Company without Cause, and provided Employee executes a general release of claims in a form acceptable to the Company within the time period specified, Employee shall be entitled to: (a) Continued payment of base salary for six (6) months following termination; (b) COBRA premium subsidies for up to six (6) months.

Upon termination for any reason, Employee shall: (c) Cooperate with the Company in transitioning Employee's duties and responsibilities
